divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the same light that we have been seeing in the sky for a couple months now. It flashes, and also moves in different directions, but just slightly. Observed by myself and 4 other people. Same light was in the eastern part of the sky last night, tonight it is in the east.
Summary: Same flashing light in the sky there again.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Mishawaka
There were no other sightings in Mishawaka on or around September 20th 2011
